comments.courage: Shows exceptional courage in challenging established transportation paradigms.
comments.innovation: Highly innovative AI-powered approach with clear technical advantages.
comments.implementation: Good progress in implementation, though scaling challenges remain.
comments.relevance: Extremely relevant to current urban mobility challenges.
comments.visibility: Strong thought leadership and media presence.
comments.general: Dr. Mitchell is a standout candidate with exceptional potential to transform urban mobility.

comments.innovation: Good innovation in sustainable transport solutions.
comments.implementation: Excellent execution track record with multiple successful projects.
comments.visibility: Growing influence in the sustainability sector.
comments.general: Strong candidate with proven impact in sustainable transportation.

comments.courage: Takes measured approach within government framework.
comments.innovation: Innovative integration of mobility into smart city infrastructure.
comments.implementation: Exceptional implementation capabilities with government backing.
comments.visibility: Could benefit from increased public visibility.
